EmailTemplate.name: PA DBA Sole Prop/Partnership
EmailTemplate.subject: PA DBA Sole Prop/Partnership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your DBA order. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: • Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support.
[USE THIS ONE IF SOLE PROP. IF NOT DELETE] • Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • Please sign your name at the bottom of the 2nd page on the first line present, above the notation ?Individual Signature?. Please also date your signature where indicated by the following: ___ day of ________, _____.
[USE THIS ONE IF PARTNERSHIP. IF NOT DELETE]
• Please have all the listed Partners sign his/her individual name at the bottom of the 2nd page on one of the lines, above the notation ?Individual Signature?. Please also apply date where indicated by the following: ___ day of ________, _____. • Mail the documents to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office will only accept original signed documents.
Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr. Glendale, CA 91203
USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our Customer Support at (800) 773-0888 or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
